about_the_game:
In 1967, Carolina and her daughter Coco both suddenly went missing. About 20 years later, reports claimed to have found a child’s body right outside an abandoned hospital. After inspecting the body, officials came to the conclusion that the body belonged to the girl who went missing 20 years ago, Coco. Logically, officials sent a search team into the abandoned hospital, in hope of finding her mother’s body. Unfortunately, none of the search team members came back. Many people have come to speculate about the existence of a supernatural being, which is referred to as the urban legend Coco, named after the dead girl.

You are part of the second search team. You can't get a hold of any of your teammates. Now that you've confirmed the existence of the urban legend, you have to find out the origin of it, but most importantly, you have to find out how to escape this place...

You can try to escape through the main entrance, which is covered in locks and such. Scavenge the hospital in order to find the items necessary for opening the entrance. 

You can also try to escape through the basement, through Dr. Hake's room. Supply the cannon with the necessary items to enable it to fire at the wall, creating an opening to escape through.

Beware, Coco hears everything... dropping items on the floor will gain her attention. If you are being chased, you will have to run for your life. You can also escape her through the use of vents or by using decoys.

After exploring the hospital, you'll come to find out that Coco isn't the only anomaly in there...

You only have five days to escape this horror of a place. Make good use of that time. If you want to survive, that is.

name: COCO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core TM i5 750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Sapphire Radeon HD 5770 1GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Coco is a survival horror game where you must escape an abandoned hospital haunted by the urban legend Coco. Make haste, you only have five days to explore and escape before Coco finds you...
